column1: Aguaí is a Brazilian municipality located in the eastern part of the state of São Paulo. The population is 34
column2: 863 (2015 est.) in an area of 475 km². The settlement Cascavel was established in 1887 near a railway station. In 1944
column3: when it was separated from São João da Boa Vista
column4: it became an independent municipality with the name Aguaí.
